author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Re: Lupin On The Top Ten!
body:
"lain is the Blade Runner of anime,"

I may have posted this before, so if I repeat it, it's cus I'm not sure it 
got sent.

I recognize the Blader Runner elements, but we all know BGC is the original 
Blade Runner-inspired anime. Though the only real cyberpunk anime for me is 
A.D. Police.

"and just like Ridley Scott didn't come out in the film and say "Decker is a 
replicant!","

He admitted that fact recently heh.

"the creators of lain didn't come out and say what lain is.  This is what 
makes lain and Blade Runner great sci-fi."

My only complaint about Lain was the scene with Arisu cybering with her 
teacher. Was that really necessary? Seemed more like fanservice to me.
I mean, cmon, Lain spreading around that information and thus destroying the 
fabric of the computer world is kind of condescending. But other than that I 
mostly enjoyed Lain.
